wikipedia_page.main:
Denis McLaughlin (born 5 February 1987) is an Irish professional association football player who plays for Muirton AFC as a striker.
He transferred from Berwick Rangers to Hearts, and then from Hearts to Torrelavege. He has also played for Cowdenbeath, Raith Rovers and Spanish club Gimnástica.

response: Current Arthurlie F.C. professional football player Denis McLaughlin is from Letterkenny.
* Denis McLaughlin, Irish footballer currently playing for RS Gimnástica de Torrelavega as a striker
